biotools.summary: DILS is a tool made to infer demographic histories with linked selection from fasta sequencing datasets. DILS is a DNA sequence analysis workflow to study the demographic history of sampled populations or species by using Approximate Bayesian Computations.

bioschemas.name: DILS
bioschemas.summary: DILS is a tool made to infer demographic histories with linked selection from fasta sequencing datasets. DILS is a DNA sequence analysis workflow to study the demographic history of sampled populations or species by using Approximate Bayesian Computations.
